  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Making objects move</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Treffen von von Nachrichten Maßnahme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Entreprendre la démarche d'objets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo o movimento dos objetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare movimento degli oggetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή της κίνησης αντικειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación de movimiento de los objetos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations demonstrating the use of force to make objects move. To move the box, it must be pushed with a force greater than the frictional force exerted by the carpeted floor on the box.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">box</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carpet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">frictional force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pushing force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">unbalanced force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, welche die 
Gewaltanwendung zeigen, Nachrichten bewegen zu lassen. Um den 
Kasten zu verschieben, muß es mit einer Kraft gedrückt werden, die 
als die Reibungskraft grösser ist, die durch den mit Teppich 
geauslegten Fußboden auf dem Kasten angewendet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations démontrant 
l'utilisation de la force de faire des objets se déplacer. Pour
déplacer le cadre, elle doit être poussée avec une force plus 
grande que la force de friction exercée par le plancher tapissé sur 
le cadre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que 
demonstram o uso de força fazer objetos mover-se. Para mover a 
caixa, deve ser empurrada com uma força mais grande do que a força 
de fricção exercida pelo assoalho atapetado na caixa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
dimostrano l'uso di forza fare gli oggetti muoversi. Per 
spostare la casella, deve essere spinta con una forza più grande 
della forza frizionale impiegata dal pavimento coperto sulla casella.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που καταδεικνύουν τη χρήση της
δύναμης για να κάνει τα αντικείμενα να κινηθούν. Για να 
κινήσει το κιβώτιο, πρέπει να ωθηθεί με μια δύναμη μεγαλύτερη 
από την της τριβής δύναμη που ασκείται από το καλυμμένο με 
τάπητα πάτωμα στο κιβώτιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que demuestran el 
uso de la fuerza de hacer que los objetos se mueven. Para mover 
el rectángulo, debe ser empujada con una fuerza mayor que la fuerza 
friccional ejercida por el suelo alfombrado en el rectángulo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kasten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teppich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reibungskraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Druck der Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unausgeglichene Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cadre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tapis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frottement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poussée de la force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force non équilibrée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caixa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tapete</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fricção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força de fricção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">empurrando a força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força desequilibrada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">casella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">moquette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza frizionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spinta della forza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza unbalanced</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κιβώτιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τάπητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τριβή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">της τριβής δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη ώθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θιγμένη δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rectángulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">alfombra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fricción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza friccional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">empujar la fuerza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza desequilibrada</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
